data.highlight: Leveraged the virtues of MERN stack to build modern and scalable solutions.

workPoints.text: Won the Constant Companion Award in the company's annual event to mark my achievements in the year 2022-23.
Won the Star Performer Award for the month of August 2023.
Interviewed candidates from within our organization to be onboarded to the project.
Implemented a POC on implementing Keycloak in one of the offline applications in our project.
Automated issual of notices against students in the current project, which removed the need for human intervention by 100%
Implemented soft delete functionality for many entities in the project.
Worked on GraphQL subscriptions to show real time logs for an Ad Campaign.

data.highlight: Worked as a Backend Developer reducing latencies.

workPoints.text: Implemented various methods like async programming concepts to reduce the latency for customers using custom design functionality.
Brought down the average wait time for a user using custom tshirt functionality by 50%.

data.highlight: Worked on Java and Manual Testing Concepts
